text: timiharula'i ke bha'eko cha ki timi munaphikaharuko sambandhama du'i samuhama vibhajita bha'iraheka chau. Allahale tiniharula'i tinakai kriyakalapale garda tiraskrta garihaleko cha. Ke timiharule aba yo yojana bana'umdaichau ki jasala'i allahale vastavika batobata tadha phyamkisakeko cha usala'i timiharule sahi batoma lya'une chau? Jasala'i allahale margabhrasta garisakyo tyasala'i timile kahilyai sahi batoma lya'una sakdainau
